name: _Delete_
description:
Your task is to remove enough programs from the virtual hard disk within the allotted time to avoid the blue screen.

    Plot: a PC user decided to install an application, but there was not enough free space on his disk. Despite this, he launched the installation anyway, but as it turned out, when the installation was delayed due to lack of space on the hard disk, fatal errors occurred. Now his task is to delete unnecessary files as he installs an important program for him.

    All levels of the game are tested in advance and are completely passable
